backlog.title: User Authentication System
backlog.description: Implement a secure user authentication system with JWT for MVP, including login, register, and password reset functionality, designed for future OAuth integration

backlog.title: Activity Tracking Feature
backlog.description: Implement core activity tracking functionality including backend API, frontend components, and dashboard widgets

backlog.title: Nutrition Logging Feature
backlog.description: Implement basic nutrition logging functionality with a simple food database, nutrient calculations, and visualization

backlog.title: Development Environment Setup
backlog.description: Set up CI/CD pipeline, Docker containers, and Git workflow for the project, including Jenkins pipeline configuration and AWS integration

backlog.title: Wireframe Finalization
backlog.description: Polish and share wireframes for authentication flow and basic component library documentation in Figma

backlog.title: Database Schema Design
backlog.description: Design and implement initial database schema for user profiles, authentication, and core features including activity tracking

backlog.title: Testing Setup
backlog.description: Set up testing frameworks (Cypress for E2E, Jest for unit testing) and write core test cases for initial features

backlog.title: Form Validation Implementation
backlog.description: Implement and standardize form validation approach across the application, considering accessibility requirements

backlog.title: JWT Storage and Refresh Mechanism
backlog.description: Implement secure JWT storage and refresh token mechanism, considering offline periods for mobile devices

backlog.title: Component Styling
backlog.description: Apply styling to authentication components and ensure mobile responsiveness
